posts.post_content:
Hi, as indicated previously I concentrate on T206 PSA graded portraits.

But, I have recently expanded out to a subset of Polar Bear backs.

I am starting from scratch so I need most of the subset and not providing a specific list.  I have recently purchased some Polar Bears from others on Net54.

Now looking for other commons in the range of SGC or PSA 1, 2, or 3.... or 
equivalent condition in raw.
